research-achievements.description: Argeting Neglected Diseases: Developing therapeutics for seven major parasitic diseases, including cryptosporidiosis, coccidiosis, babesiosis, theileriosis, toxoplasmosis, piroplasmosis, and cystoisosporiasis.
First-in-Class Therapeutics: Creating innovative compounds specifically designed for veterinary applications.
Broad-Spectrum Solutions: A single platform addressing multiple diseases across livestock and companion animals.
Proven Preclinical Success: Demonstrating exceptional efficacy and safety in early studies across target diseases.
Sustainable Farming Practices: Reducing reliance on antibiotics and addressing resistance issues with novel approaches.
